content.description: Another crag just east of Infinity wall on the right hand side of the cascade hosts a handful of nice ice flows in the 50 foot range.  This cliff is south facing like the majority of Rumney crags, but it is sheltered by the trees, so it doesn't get an overwhelming amount of light.  Most likely you will never see anyone here as this is still one of the rarely if ever visited areas of Rumney.
